item.description:
Introduction to Taoist Philosophy & Practice

Discover the philosophy of Taoism, a practice based on the five elements of water, wood, fire, metal and earth. By learning to balance these elements through breathing, energy work and grounding exercises, you will gain an understanding of how to apply Taoist philosophy to your health and achieve greater harmony in your life. Practical application will include the practice of SunDo, a Taoist Yoga & Meditation practice from ancient Korea. This course will conclude with an authentic Korean lunch for all participants.

This is a 3-class series but classes can also be taken individually. We will meet on Saturday - February 27, March 6 and March 13 - at 9:30 am.

Class 1 - Feb 27
1 hour SunDo practice
Meditation with tea
Discussion of breathing, qi energy, postures and the 5 elements

Class 2 - March 6
1 hour SunDo practice
Meditation with tea
Discussion of 5 elements and the Taoist Self-Healing Wheel

Class 3 - March 13
1 hour SunDo practice
Meditation with tea
Discussion of Taoism and its relationship with nature
12 pm - Korean lunch at Ichiban


Each class session will go until approximately 11 am. There will be a short tea meditation with roasted corn or barley tea, traditional teas served in Korea. For each class, participants will receive an informational article on the class discussion topics. On the last day, we will go to lunch at Ichiban, an authentic Japanese & Korean restaurant.

Cost for all three classes is $29 for West Hartford residents, and $39 for non-residents. Or $15 for a single class. Cost does not include the Korean lunch. This course is also being offered through, LifeLearn, West Hartford's Continuing Education Program.

Space is limited participants so please RSVP only if you are sure you want to attend. For more information about SunDo-Taoism, please visit www.sundo.org.


Introduction to Taoist Philosophy & Practice
Saturday, 9:30 am
Feb 27, March 6 & 13
with SunDo Instructors, Christine Ucich and Eunmi Han

SunDo Mountain Taoist Center
45 South Main Street, Suite 90
West Hartford CT 06107
item.name: Introduction to Taoist Philosophy & Practice
